name: Carry me, please!
description:
You have to carry player2 by player1 :) Romantic platformer with puzzle elements.

Grab, throw and wall-jump to drag your partner through the game!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • Z - take, put/throw.
  • Arrows - walk, throw direction;
  • Spacebar - jump;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

Sooo, what do you do when you wanna play a hot-seat game when you're home alone? 

or

What do you do when you wanna go for a walk with your GF, but she does not feel like it?

The answer is the same! You take the bull by the horns! You head out for it even if you have to drag your partner through the level, ready to overcome any challenges you meet. Good luck!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Awesome pixelart environment pack: https://rottingpixels.itch.io/four-seasons-platformer-tileset-16x16free

And animated characters from the same talented creator: https://rottingpixels.itch.io/2d-platformer-characters-pack-16x32free

Font: kongtext font from http://www.zone38.net/font/
